skillTree.localised_description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can fire while on the move.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: The steam tank Ignis Draconis was the first tank built by Leonardo of Miragliano.

attributes.bullet_text:
This unit has variable  Missile Block Chance depending on which side of the unit is hit by a projectile.
	
	The missile block chance of each direction is:
	 100% from the front
	 50% from the sides
	 10% from the rear
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can fire while on the move.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: Ludwig's bodyguard detachment of Imperial Halberdiers were cut down by Greenskin filith and now he seeks revenge for his fallen brothers.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins

skillTree.localised_description: The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.
Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Dwarfs are resolute - once they commit to charging the foe, they put all their strength behind that initial blow.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Dwarfen craftsmanship ensures any weapon is infinitely more likely to run out of ammunition before succumbing to the stress of battle!
If a Master Engineer wants something, he'll get it. Quartermasters can rarely refuse a demanding Guild engineer.
Engineers use number-lore to work out the best trajectories and prime killing arcs for their war machines.
Those Engineers that spend their lives underground have a good understanding of war in the caverns.
A Sapper excels at breaking entrenched foes. He can quickly get artillery into the best position.

effects.description:
Speed: +3% for all Missile units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +8% for all Missile units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +15% for all Missile units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Bring the Barag forwards! Hand me that spyglass!"

target_if: Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform

skillTree.localised_description: A dead eye shot is an Engineer or Thunderer that can hit a target at over five hundred (Dwarfen) paces.
Each round delicately crafted to deliver death with a personal touch.
While many engineers carry innumerable tools on their person, some espouse the art of carrying only five different protractors.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

skillTree.localised_description: Those Engineers conversant in ballistics know how best to increase the ranges of their weapons.
The deadly blast of the Grudge-raker inspires fear in even the most dimwitted creature.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: In possession of countless irreplaceable tools and devices, no Master Engineer goes down without a fight!
Engineers always tinker, naming these tweaks "enhancements" - most do improve whatever contraption they are working on.
"Stand Back! These are Dawr, but this is only the milluzth attempt!"
Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can fire while on the move.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Nothing is beyond that of which he dreams, with old hands he deftly put to fruition his machinations.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead
